title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Generative AI, agents, MCP, and the future of AI-powered software development
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 生成式AI、智能体、MCP与AI驱动软件开发的未来
abstract: Follow along as we uncover the powerful forces shaping the future of AI coding. From the emergence of intelligent agents to Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers, we'll explore the latest advancements and real-world use cases that are redefining what's possible for developer productivity and creativity. By the end, you'll feel empowered to embrace the magic of AI, no matter how daunting the technology may seem.
abstract_cn: 跟随我们一起揭示塑造AI编码未来的强大力量。从智能代理的出现到模型上下文协议(MCP)服务器,我们将探索最新的进展和实际应用案例,这些正在重新定义开发者生产力和创造力的可能性。最后,无论这项技术看起来多么令人生畏,你都会感到有能力拥抱AI的魔力。

presenter.name: Derek Chiles
presenter.title: Head of SA, Next Gen Developer Experience

presenter.name: Pavitra Krishnan
presenter.title: Mgr. World Wide Solution Architecture, Developer Experience
